workshoptitle: Capture Oracle Database Changes for CI/CD

tutorials.title: Prerequisites
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisites for customers using Free Trial and Paid tenancies, and Always Free accounts (if applicable). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: The Introduction is always second. The title and contents menu title match for the Introduction.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Use SQLcl to Capture Database Changes with Liquibase
tutorials.description: This lab shows how easy it is to capture changes in Oracle Database using Liquibase, from SQLcl command line, and push them to your GitHub repository.

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Use SQL Developer to Capture Database Changes with Liquibase
tutorials.description: This lab shows how easy it is to capture changes in Oracle Database using Liquibase, from SQL Developer worksheet, and push them to your GitHub repository.
